isis.stitle: T 444E Diesel Engine Diagnostics (NAVPAK) (1997) - SECTION 3.5: ELECTRONIC CONTROL SYSTEM DIAGNOSTICS, ACCELERATOR PEDAL POSITION SENSOR/IVS SWITCH (APS/IVS) - REMOTE ACCELERATOR PEDAL SENSOR - BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING

svcproc.title: BEFORE TROUBLESHOOTING
svcproc.para: Before troubleshooting make sure that the batteries are fully charged. Check battery connections and grounds for clean, tight connections free of damage. Voltage test will give misleading results if the batteries are not fully charged.

Before troubleshooting inspect circuit connectors for pushed back loose or damaged (spread or bent) terminals, or wires with cut strands, etc. Wires and connections must be free of damage or corrosion. When some connectors corrode, a light white residue will be present that must be removed.
Before troubleshooting, inspect suspect circuit grounds for clean, tight connections free of damage.
